list-item.p: M: total power of agricultural machinery in units of ten thousand kilowatts;
F: aggregate quantity of fertilizer used in millions of tons;
A: area for wheat cultivation measured in thousands of hectares;
Y: wheat yield per unit area, defined as the wheat output divided by its cultivated area;
P: total precipitation for the wheat growth period measured in millimeters; and
T: average temperature in degrees Celsius for the wheat growth period.
